name: WKRefreshBackgroundTask
desc: The abstract superclass for WatchKit's other background task classes.

items.name: var userInfo: (NSSecureCoding & NSObjectProtocol)?
items.desc: Custom information associated with the background task.

items.name: var expirationHandler: (() -> Void)?
items.desc: A block that the system calls when the available runtime for a background task is about to expire.

items.name: func setTaskCompletedWithSnapshot(Bool)
items.desc: Marks the task as complete and indicates whether the system should take a new snapshot of the app.
